title: New South Wales Under-20's rugby league team
text:
The New South Wales Under-20's rugby league team, also known as <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a> Under-20s or New South Wales U20, represents <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a> in the sport of <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> at an under-20 age level. Since 2012, the team has played an annual fixture against the <a href="Queensland%20under-20%20rugby%20league%20team">Queensland Under-20s team</a> for the <a href="Darren%20Lockyer">Darren Lockyer</a> Shield. The team features players selected from the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">National Rugby League</a> (NRL), <a href="National%20Youth%20Competition%20%28rugby%20league%29">Holden Cup</a>, <a href="Jersey%20Flegg%20Cup">Jersey Flegg Cup</a> and <a href="Intrust%20Super%20Premiership%20NSW">Intrust Super Premiership</a> competitions. They are administered by the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League">New South Wales Rugby League</a>.
History.
Prior to the advent of the <a href="National%20Youth%20Competition%20%28rugby%20league%29">National Youth Competition</a>, junior <a href="State%20of%20Origin%20series">interstate</a> matches were contested at under-17 and under-19 levels. In 2008, the age levels switched to an under-16 and under-18 format but no under-20 game was held until 2012. In March 2012, the first under-20 Origin match was announced by the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">National Rugby League</a>. The NRL had been looking into running the match for more than 18 months.
From 2012 to 2014, the under-20 Origin fixture was held in April, on the Representative Weekend. In 2015, the game was moved to July as a curtain-raiser to State of Origin. As of 2017, the New South Wales under-20 team have for every fixture, winning six consecutive games since 2012. In 2018, they recorded their first lose, losing to Queensland 30–12 at <a href="Suncorp%20Stadium">Suncorp Stadium</a>.
Players.
Players selected for the New South Wales under-20 team are under contract with a <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">National Rugby League</a> (NRL) side and play in either the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">NRL</a>, <a href="National%20Youth%20Competition%20%28rugby%20league%29">Holden Cup</a>, <a href="Jersey%20Flegg%20Cup">Jersey Flegg Cup</a> or <a href="Intrust%20Super%20Premiership%20NSW">Intrust Super Premiership</a> competitions. Since 2013, the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League">NSWRL</a>'s selected a pre-season under-20 squad featuring players in contention for the mid-season fixture.
